text: Edward Payne may refer to: * Edward Payne (banker), Governor of the Bank of England, 1771–1773 * Edward Howard Payne (1849–1908), businessman from Missouri; benefactor and namesake of Howard Payne University, Brownwood, Texas * Edward John Payne (1844–1904), English barrister and historian ==See also== * Eddie Payne (born 1951), American college basketball coach * Eddie N. Payne (1873–1951), member of the Louisiana House of Representatives
title: Edward Payne
